```diff
- 
+ <template>
+   <el-breadcrumb separator="/">
+     <transition-group name="breadcrumb">
+       <el-breadcrumb-item
+         v-for="(item, index) in breadcrumbs"
+         :key="item.path"
+       >
+         <span
+           v-if="index === breadcrumbs.length - 1"
+           class="no-redirect"
+         >{{ item.meta.title }}</span>
+         <a
+           v-else
+           @click.prevent="handleLink(item)"
+         >{{ item.meta.title }}</a>
+       </el-breadcrumb-item>
+     </transition-group>
+   </el-breadcrumb>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup>
+ import { ref, watch } from 'vue'
+ import { useRoute, useRouter } from 'vue-router'
+ 
+ const route = useRoute()
+ const router = useRouter()
+ const breadcrumbs = ref([])
+ 
+ const getBreadcrumb = () => {
+   let matched = route.matched.filter(item => item.meta && item.meta.title)
+   const first = matched[0]
+ 
+   if (!first || first.path !== '/dashboard') {
+     matched = [{ path: '/dashboard', meta: { title: 'é¦–é¡µ' } }].concat(matched)
+   }
+ 
+   breadcrumbs.value = matched
+ }
+ 
+ const handleLink = (item) => {
+   const { redirect, path } = item
+   if (redirect) {
+     router.push(redirect)
+     return
+   }
+   router.push(path)
+ }
+ 
+ watch(
+   () => route.path,
+   () => {
+     getBreadcrumb()
+   }
+ )
+ 
+ getBreadcrumb()
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style lang="scss" scoped>
+ .el-breadcrumb {
+   display: inline-block;
+   font-size: 14px;
+   line-height: 50px;
+   margin-left: 8px;
+ 
+   .no-redirect {
+     color: #97a8be;
+     cursor: text;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ .breadcrumb-enter-active,
+ .breadcrumb-leave-active {
+   transition: all .5s;
+ }
+ 
+ .breadcrumb-enter-from,
+ .breadcrumb-leave-active {
+   opacity: 0;
+   transform: translateX(20px);
+ }
+ 
+ .breadcrumb-leave-active {
+   position: absolute;
+ }
+ </style> 
```

```diff
+ const router = createRouter({
+   history: createWebHistory(),
+   routes
+ })
+ 
+ // è·¯ç”±å®ˆå«
+ router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+   const token = localStorage.getItem('token')
+   if (to.path === '/login') {
+     if (token) {
+       next('/')
+     } else {
+       next()
+     }
+   } else {
+     if (token) {
+       next()
+     } else {
+       next('/login')
+     }
+   }
+ })
+ 
+ export default router
```

```diff
+         <el-table-column prop="sort" label="æ’åº" width="100" />
+         <el-table-column prop="createTime" label="åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´" width="180" />
+         <el-table-column label="æ“ä½œ" width="200" fixed="right">
+           <template #default="{ row }">
+             <el-button type="primary" link @click="handleEdit(row)">
+               ç¼–è¾‘
+             </el-button>
+             <el-button type="danger" link @click="handleDelete(row)">
+               åˆ é™¤
+             </el-button>
+           </template>
+         </el-table-column>
+       </el-table>
+ 
+       <!-- åˆ†é¡µ -->
+       <div class="pagination-container">
+         <el-pagination
+           v-model:current-page="currentPage"
+           v-model:page-size="pageSize"
+           :page-sizes="[10, 20, 30, 50]"
+           layout="total, sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper"
+           :total="total"
+           @size-change="handleSizeChange"
+           @current-change="handleCurrentChange"
+         />
+       </div>
+     </el-card>
+ 
+     <!-- æ–°å¢/ç¼–è¾‘å¯¹è¯æ¡† -->
+     <el-dialog
+       v-model="dialogVisible"
+       :title="dialogType === 'add' ? 'æ–°å¢åˆ†ç±»' : 'ç¼–è¾‘åˆ†ç±»'"
+       width="500px"
+     >
+       <el-form
+         ref="formRef"
+         :model="form"
+         :rules="rules"
+         label-width="80px"
+       >
+         <el-form-item label="åˆ†ç±»åç§°" prop="name">
+           <el-input v-model="form.name" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥åˆ†ç±»åç§°" />
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item label="æ’åº" prop="sort">
+           <el-input-number v-model="form.sort" :min="0" :max="999" />
+         </el-form-item>
+       </el-form>
+       <template #footer>
+         <span class="dialog-footer">
+           <el-button @click="dialogVisible = false">å–æ¶ˆ</el-button>
+           <el-button type="primary" @click="handleSubmit">
+             ç¡®å®š
+           </el-button>
+         </span>
+       </template>
+     </el-dialog>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup>
+ import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue'
+ import { ElMessage, ElMessageBox } from 'element-plus'
+ 
+ // è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®
+ const loading = ref(false)
+ const categoryList = ref([])
+ const currentPage = ref(1)
+ const pageSize = ref(10)
+ const total = ref(0)
+ 
+ // å¯¹è¯æ¡†æ•°æ®
+ const dialogVisible = ref(false)
+ const dialogType = ref('add')
+ const formRef = ref(null)
+ const form = ref({
+   name: '',
+   sort: 0
+ })
+ 
+ // è¡¨å•éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
+ const rules = {
+   name: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥åˆ†ç±»åç§°', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 2, max: 20, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 2 åˆ° 20 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   sort: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ’åºå·', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ]
+ }
+ 
+ // è·å–åˆ†ç±»åˆ—è¡¨
+ const getList = async () => {
+   loading.value = true
+   try {
+     // TODO: è°ƒç”¨æ¥å£è·å–æ•°æ®
+     // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®
+     categoryList.value = [
+       { id: 1, name: 'æ–°é—»èµ„è®¯', sort: 1, createTime: '2024-03-16 12:00:00' },
+       { id: 2, name: 'æ´»åŠ¨å…¬å‘Š', sort: 2, createTime: '2024-03-16 12:00:00' }
+     ]
+     total.value = 2
+   } catch (error) {
+     ElMessage.error('è·å–åˆ†ç±»åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥')
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æ–°å¢åˆ†ç±»
+ const handleAdd = () => {
+   dialogType.value = 'add'
+   form.value = {
+     name: '',
+     sort: 0
+   }
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ // ç¼–è¾‘åˆ†ç±»
+ const handleEdit = (row) => {
+   dialogType.value = 'edit'
+   form.value = { ...row }
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ é™¤åˆ†ç±»
+ const handleDelete = (row) => {
+   ElMessageBox.confirm(
+     'ç¡®è®¤åˆ é™¤è¯¥åˆ†ç±»å—ï¼Ÿ',
+     'è­¦å‘Š',
+     {
+       confirmButtonText: 'ç¡®å®š',
+       cancelButtonText: 'å–æ¶ˆ',
+       type: 'warning'
+     }
+   ).then(async () => {
+     try {
+       // TODO: è°ƒç”¨åˆ é™¤æ¥å£
+       ElMessage.success('åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ')
+       getList()
+     } catch (error) {
+       ElMessage.error('åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥')
+     }
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // æäº¤è¡¨å•
+ const handleSubmit = async () => {
+   if (!formRef.value) return
+   await formRef.value.validate(async (valid) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       try {
+         // TODO: è°ƒç”¨æ–°å¢/ç¼–è¾‘æ¥å£
+         ElMessage.success(dialogType.value === 'add' ? 'æ–°å¢æˆåŠŸ' : 'ç¼–è¾‘æˆåŠŸ')
+         dialogVisible.value = false
+         getList()
+       } catch (error) {
+         ElMessage.error(dialogType.value === 'add' ? 'æ–°å¢å¤±è´¥' : 'ç¼–è¾‘å¤±è´¥')
+       }
+     }
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ†é¡µç›¸å…³
+ const handleSizeChange = (val) => {
+   pageSize.value = val
+   getList()
+ }
+ 
+ const handleCurrentChange = (val) => {
+   currentPage.value = val
+   getList()
+ }
+ 
+ onMounted(() => {
+   getList()
+ })
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style lang="scss" scoped>
+ .category-container {
+   padding: 20px;
+ 
+   .card-header {
+     display: flex;
+     justify-content: space-between;
+     align-items: center;
+   }
+ 
+   .pagination-container {
+     margin-top: 20px;
+     display: flex;
+     justify-content: flex-end;
+   }
+ }
+ </style> 
```

```diff
+           <el-input v-model="form.title" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥æ ‡é¢˜" />
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item label="åˆ†ç±»" prop="categoryId">
+           <el-select v-model="form.categoryId" placeholder="è¯·é€‰æ‹©åˆ†ç±»">
+             <el-option
+               v-for="item in categoryOptions"
+               :key="item.id"
+               :label="item.name"
+               :value="item.id"
+             />
+           </el-select>
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item label="å°é¢å›¾" prop="coverUrl">
+           <el-upload
+             class="cover-uploader"
+             action="/api/upload"
+             :show-file-list="false"
+             :on-success="handleUploadSuccess"
+             :before-upload="beforeUpload"
+           >
+             <img v-if="form.coverUrl" :src="form.coverUrl" class="cover-image" />
+             <el-icon v-else class="cover-uploader-icon"><Plus /></el-icon>
+           </el-upload>
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item label="å†…å®¹" prop="content">
+           <!-- è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥é›†æˆå¯Œæ–‡æœ¬ç¼–è¾‘å™¨ï¼Œå¦‚ TinyMCEã€Wangeditor ç­‰ -->
+           <el-input
+             v-model="form.content"
+             type="textarea"
+             :rows="10"
+             placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥å†…å®¹"
+           />
+         </el-form-item>
+       </el-form>
+       <template #footer>
+         <span class="dialog-footer">
+           <el-button @click="dialogVisible = false">å–æ¶ˆ</el-button>
+           <el-button type="primary" @click="handleSubmit">
+             ç¡®å®š
+           </el-button>
+         </span>
+       </template>
+     </el-dialog>
+ 
+     <!-- å®¡æ ¸å¯¹è¯æ¡† -->
+     <el-dialog
+       v-model="auditDialogVisible"
+       title="ç¨¿ä»¶å®¡æ ¸"
+       width="500px"
+     >
+       <el-form
+         ref="auditFormRef"
+         :model="auditForm"
+         :rules="auditRules"
+         label-width="80px"
+       >
+         <el-form-item label="å®¡æ ¸ç»“æœ" prop="status">
+           <el-radio-group v-model="auditForm.status">
+             <el-radio :label="1">é€šè¿‡</el-radio>
+             <el-radio :label="2">æ‹’ç»</el-radio>
+           </el-radio-group>
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item
+           label="å®¡æ ¸æ„è§"
+           prop="remark"
+           v-if="auditForm.status === 2"
+         >
+           <el-input
+             v-model="auditForm.remark"
+             type="textarea"
+             :rows="3"
+             placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥æ‹’ç»åŸå› "
+           />
+         </el-form-item>
+       </el-form>
+       <template #footer>
+         <span class="dialog-footer">
+           <el-button @click="auditDialogVisible = false">å–æ¶ˆ</el-button>
+           <el-button type="primary" @click="handleAuditSubmit">
+             ç¡®å®š
+           </el-button>
+         </span>
+       </template>
+     </el-dialog>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup>
+ import { ref, computed, onMounted } from 'vue'
+ import { ElMessage, ElMessageBox } from 'element-plus'
+ import { Plus } from '@element-plus/icons-vue'
+ 
+ // æœç´¢è¡¨å•
+ const searchForm = ref({
+   keyword: '',
+   status: ''
+ })
+ 
+ // è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®
+ const loading = ref(false)
+ const articleList = ref([])
+ const currentPage = ref(1)
+ const pageSize = ref(10)
+ const total = ref(0)
+ 
+ // åˆ†ç±»é€‰é¡¹
+ const categoryOptions = ref([
+   { id: 1, name: 'æ–°é—»èµ„è®¯' },
+   { id: 2, name: 'æ´»åŠ¨å…¬å‘Š' }
+ ])
+ 
+ // å¯¹è¯æ¡†æ•°æ®
+ const dialogVisible = ref(false)
+ const dialogType = ref('add')
+ const formRef = ref(null)
+ const form = ref({
+   title: '',
+   categoryId: '',
+   coverUrl: '',
+   content: ''
+ })
+ 
+ // å®¡æ ¸å¯¹è¯æ¡†æ•°æ®
+ const auditDialogVisible = ref(false)
+ const auditFormRef = ref(null)
+ const auditForm = ref({
+   id: null,
+   status: 1,
+   remark: ''
+ })
+ 
+ // è¡¨å•éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
+ const rules = {
+   title: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ ‡é¢˜', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 2, max: 100, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 2 åˆ° 100 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   categoryId: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·é€‰æ‹©åˆ†ç±»', trigger: 'change' }
+   ],
+   content: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å†…å®¹', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ]
+ }
+ 
+ // å®¡æ ¸è¡¨å•éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
+ const auditRules = {
+   status: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·é€‰æ‹©å®¡æ ¸ç»“æœ', trigger: 'change' }
+   ],
+   remark: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ‹’ç»åŸå› ', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ]
+ }
+ 
+ // è®¡ç®—å±æ€§
+ const getDialogTitle = computed(() => {
+   const titles = {
+     add: 'æ–°å¢ç¨¿ä»¶',
+     edit: 'ç¼–è¾‘ç¨¿ä»¶',
+     view: 'æŸ¥çœ‹ç¨¿ä»¶'
+   }
+   return titles[dialogType.value]
+ })
+ 
+ // è·å–çŠ¶æ€ç±»å‹
+ const getStatusType = (status) => {
+   const types = {
+     0: 'warning',
+     1: 'success',
+     2: 'danger'
+   }
+   return types[status]
+ }
+ 
+ // è·å–çŠ¶æ€æ–‡æœ¬
+ const getStatusText = (status) => {
+   const texts = {
+     0: 'å¾…å®¡æ ¸',
+     1: 'å·²é€šè¿‡',
+     2: 'å·²æ‹’ç»'
+   }
+   return texts[status]
+ }
+ 
+ // è·å–ç¨¿ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨
+ const getList = async () => {
+   loading.value = true
+   try {
+     // TODO: è°ƒç”¨æ¥å£è·å–æ•°æ®
+     // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®
+     articleList.value = [
+       {
+         id: 1,
+         title: 'ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨¿ä»¶1',
+         author: 'å¼ ä¸‰',
+         categoryId: 1,
+         categoryName: 'æ–°é—»èµ„è®¯',
+         createTime: '2024-03-16 12:00:00',
+         status: 0
+       },
+       {
+         id: 2,
+         title: 'ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨¿ä»¶2',
+         author: 'æå››',
+         categoryId: 2,
+         categoryName: 'æ´»åŠ¨å…¬å‘Š',
+         createTime: '2024-03-16 13:00:00',
+         status: 1
+       }
+     ]
+     total.value = 2
+   } catch (error) {
+     ElMessage.error('è·å–ç¨¿ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥')
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æœç´¢
+ const handleSearch = () => {
+   currentPage.value = 1
+   getList()
+ }
+ 
+ // æ–°å¢ç¨¿ä»¶
+ const handleAdd = () => {
+   dialogType.value = 'add'
+   form.value = {
+     title: '',
+     categoryId: '',
+     coverUrl: '',
+     content: ''
+   }
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ // æŸ¥çœ‹ç¨¿ä»¶
+ const handleView = (row) => {
+   dialogType.value = 'view'
+   form.value = { ...row }
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ // ç¼–è¾‘ç¨¿ä»¶
+ const handleEdit = (row) => {
+   dialogType.value = 'edit'
+   form.value = { ...row }
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ // å®¡æ ¸ç¨¿ä»¶
+ const handleAudit = (row) => {
+   auditForm.value = {
+     id: row.id,
+     status: 1,
+     remark: ''
+   }
+   auditDialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ é™¤ç¨¿ä»¶
+ const handleDelete = (row) => {
+   ElMessageBox.confirm(
+     'ç¡®è®¤åˆ é™¤è¯¥ç¨¿ä»¶å—ï¼Ÿ',
+     'è­¦å‘Š',
+     {
+       confirmButtonText: 'ç¡®å®š',
+       cancelButtonText: 'å–æ¶ˆ',
+       type: 'warning'
+     }
+   ).then(async () => {
+     try {
+       // TODO: è°ƒç”¨åˆ é™¤æ¥å£
+       ElMessage.success('åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ')
+       getList()
+     } catch (error) {
+       ElMessage.error('åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥')
+     }
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // ä¸Šä¼ ç›¸å…³
+ const beforeUpload = (file) => {
+   const isImage = file.type.startsWith('image/')
+   const isLt2M = file.size / 1024 / 1024 < 2
+ 
+   if (!isImage) {
+     ElMessage.error('ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶åªèƒ½æ˜¯å›¾ç‰‡æ ¼å¼!')
+     return false
+   }
+   if (!isLt2M) {
+     ElMessage.error('ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡å¤§å°ä¸èƒ½è¶…è¿‡ 2MB!')
+     return false
+   }
+   return true
+ }
+ 
+ const handleUploadSuccess = (response) => {
+   // TODO: å¤„ç†ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸåçš„å“åº”
+   form.value.coverUrl = response.url
+ }
+ 
+ // æäº¤è¡¨å•
+ const handleSubmit = async () => {
+   if (!formRef.value) return
+   await formRef.value.validate(async (valid) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       try {
+         // TODO: è°ƒç”¨æ–°å¢/ç¼–è¾‘æ¥å£
+         ElMessage.success(dialogType.value === 'add' ? 'æ–°å¢æˆåŠŸ' : 'ç¼–è¾‘æˆåŠŸ')
+         dialogVisible.value = false
+         getList()
+       } catch (error) {
+         ElMessage.error(dialogType.value === 'add' ? 'æ–°å¢å¤±è´¥' : 'ç¼–è¾‘å¤±è´¥')
+       }
+     }
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // æäº¤å®¡æ ¸
+ const handleAuditSubmit = async () => {
+   if (!auditFormRef.value) return
+   await auditFormRef.value.validate(async (valid) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       try {
+         // TODO: è°ƒç”¨å®¡æ ¸æ¥å£
+         ElMessage.success('å®¡æ ¸æäº¤æˆåŠŸ')
+         auditDialogVisible.value = false
+         getList()
+       } catch (error) {
+         ElMessage.error('å®¡æ ¸æäº¤å¤±è´¥')
+       }
+     }
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ†é¡µç›¸å…³
+ const handleSizeChange = (val) => {
+   pageSize.value = val
+   getList()
+ }
+ 
+ const handleCurrentChange = (val) => {
+   currentPage.value = val
+   getList()
+ }
+ 
+ onMounted(() => {
+   getList()
+ })
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style lang="scss" scoped>
+ .article-container {
+   padding: 20px;
+ 
+   .card-header {
+     display: flex;
+     justify-content: space-between;
+     align-items: center;
+ 
+     .left {
+       display: flex;
+       align-items: center;
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   .pagination-container {
+     margin-top: 20px;
+     display: flex;
+     justify-content: flex-end;
+   }
+ 
+   .cover-uploader {
+     border: 1px dashed var(--el-border-color);
+     border-radius: 6px;
+     cursor: pointer;
+     position: relative;
+     overflow: hidden;
+     transition: var(--el-transition-duration-fast);
+ 
+     &:hover {
+       border-color: var(--el-color-primary);
+     }
+ 
+     .cover-uploader-icon {
+       font-size: 28px;
+       color: #8c939d;
+       width: 200px;
+       height: 120px;
+       text-align: center;
+       line-height: 120px;
+     }
+ 
+     .cover-image {
+       width: 200px;
+       height: 120px;
+       display: block;
+       object-fit: cover;
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ </style>
```

```diff
+ 
+ // åˆ‡æ¢çŠ¶æ€
+ const handleToggleStatus = async (row) => {
+   try {
+     // TODO: è°ƒç”¨åˆ‡æ¢çŠ¶æ€æ¥å£
+     ElMessage.success(row.status ? 'ä¸‹æ¶æˆåŠŸ' : 'ä¸Šæ¶æˆåŠŸ')
+     row.status = row.status ? 0 : 1
+   } catch (error) {
+     ElMessage.error('æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥')

+ }

+ // åˆ é™¤å•†å“
+ const handleDelete = (row) => {
+   ElMessageBox.confirm(
+     'ç¡®è®¤åˆ é™¤è¯¥å•†å“å—ï¼Ÿ',
+     'è­¦å‘Š',
+     {
+       confirmButtonText: 'ç¡®å®š',
+       cancelButtonText: 'å–æ¶ˆ',
+       type: 'warning'
+     }
+   ).then(async () => {
+     try {
+       // TODO: è°ƒç”¨åˆ é™¤æ¥å£
+       ElMessage.success('åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ')
+       getList()
+     } catch (error) {
+       ElMessage.error('åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥')
+     }
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // ä¸Šä¼ ç›¸å…³
+ const beforeUpload = (file) => {
+   const isImage = file.type.startsWith('image/')
+   const isLt2M = file.size / 1024 / 1024 < 2
+ 
+   if (!isImage) {
+     ElMessage.error('ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶åªèƒ½æ˜¯å›¾ç‰‡æ ¼å¼!')
+     return false
+   }

+     return false
+   }
+   return true
+ }
+ 
+ const handleUploadSuccess = (response) => {
+   // TODO: å¤„ç†ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸåçš„å“åº”
+   form.value.imageUrl = response.url
+ }
+ 
+ // æäº¤è¡¨å•
+ const handleSubmit = async () => {
+   if (!formRef.value) return
+   await formRef.value.validate(async (valid) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       try {
+         // TODO: è°ƒç”¨æ–°å¢/ç¼–è¾‘æ¥å£
+         ElMessage.success(dialogType.value === 'add' ? 'æ–°å¢æˆåŠŸ' : 'ç¼–è¾‘æˆåŠŸ')
+         dialogVisible.value = false

+         ElMessage.error(dialogType.value === 'add' ? 'æ–°å¢å¤±è´¥' : 'ç¼–è¾‘å¤±è´¥')
+       }
+     }
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ†é¡µç›¸å…³
+ const handleSizeChange = (val) => {
+   pageSize.value = val
+   getList()
+ }
+ 
+ const handleCurrentChange = (val) => {
+   currentPage.value = val
+   getList()
+ }
+ 
+ onMounted(() => {
+   getList()
+ })
+ </script>
```

```diff
+ const currentPage = ref(1)
+ const pageSize = ref(10)
+ const total = ref(0)
+

+   name: '',
```
